extendedInfo.description: Watch full length Nollywood movies, African movies, Short films, Trailers, Music videos and full length Bollywood movies on your Android phone. On Afrinolly you get to watch the best of Nigerian movies and other African movies including Short films/Documentaries and comedy. Afrinolly also brings to you the latest African celebrity news plus gossip about movies, music and celebrities in Africa.WATCHWatch Nollywood/African Full Length Movies Free, Short films, Trailers, Nigerian Music Videos, Ghanaian Music Videos, Kenyan Music Videos, South African Music Videos, Comedy Online and Concert Videos from across Africa. Also watch Bollywood Full length Movies and Trailers.READRead Latest African Entertainment news; Nigeria Celebrity news, South-Africa Celebrity news, Ghana Celebrity news, Kenya Celebrity Gist and Gossip, Users reviews on movies and Celebrity Mini Bios from across Africa.ENJOYEnjoy the best of sub 15mins Short films and Documentaries from Africa's emerging film makers including the winning entries and honorary mentions of the Afrinolly Short Film Competition.FOLLOWFollow Upcoming Movies, Your Favorite Nollywood Celebrities and Entertainment Events from across Africa.SHAREShare your opinion on Nollywood movies. Share trailers and news with friends via email, Facebook, Google+, Twitter and other sharing apps.EXPLOREMost popular trailers of the day, Most popular celebrities of the day (Celebmeter), Latest Music Videos and Trending YouTube Videos in your location.RATESign in with your Facebook account to rate movies and also to write reviews on movies for the Afrinolly community members to read.If you have questions, please see our FAQ page in the app or send an email to feedback@afrinolly.comGalaxy S2 and Galaxy Note users; if you are having trouble uninstalling it's because Afrinolly in your device is a system app that has been pre installed in Nigeria and some other countries. We are sorry for any inconvenience.Thank you.

reviews.comment: I do not want this app on my phone. I am trying to uninstall it, but you will not let me. Now you are like Apple. Stop giving firmware update excuses and put out an update that will allow users to uninstall the app if they so desire. This is my smartphone, not yours to control.\tI do not want this app on my phone. I am trying to uninstall it, but you will not let me. Now you are like Apple. Stop giving firmware update excuses and put out an update that will allow users to uninstall the app if they so desire. This is my smartphone, not yours to control.
